attributes.action: Grants and Funding for pig producers in the UK and Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details:
pig producers are treated unfairly when it comes to grants and funding unlike the dairy farmer who gets a single farm subsidy and grants the pig producer gets nothing this petition is to help get grants and funding for things such as

Feed cost 
Equipment Costs 
Building Costs 
Maintenance Costs  
 Veterinary Costs
attributes.background:
grants and funding for
pig farmers to help support financial difficulties due to feed cost and unfair prices

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The UK Government is only responsible for agricultural policy, including grants for pig producers, in England.
